Text: annother awesome UL!  1 of my fave series from the 80's!

Holy shit, I don't know what are they waiting for in the Vatican. We clearly have a winner. 

Did you manage to get Dr. Fate or The Spectre (I'm not trying to hurry you, I'm curious because I have never found download links for those)
Thanks for compiling this, STF. This is awesome.
thx man! i'd actually searched tpb for this, to no avail, a couple months ago

good to know that these comics are reaching readers who enjoy and/or want 'em.  :-)

i had a rough day, we had to have one of our pets euthanized. so it's nice to sit down and read your comments while downloading some more.

Oneiromancer12, some guy in a gold helmet says to look out for a torrent soon ...
which volume of the Spectre do you want?  I have everything spectre, period!  LMK
Mothra67, Spectre volume 2, the 1987-89 book - 31 issues and an annual.

Oneiromancer2, here's dr. fate by dematteis: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8248016/

by the way, dematteis will be back at dc soon... as co-writer on phantom stranger, iirc.

genuinely sry to hear about your pet STF. been down that road with a dog that meant a lot myself. thx for all the hard work u put in on here, and I hope the good times with your pet can stay foremost in your thoughts

You rock again! The reading list for the Question was one of the key factors in my not growing up a knucklehead. I have the complete series but never want to take them out of the plastic. Thanks for the upload and sorry for your loss.
thanks combinationskin i appreciate that. man denny o'neil and his recommended readings ... that guy's a legend among legends. did you know he still teaches writing for comics at nyu in new york?
